cleaned_text: FOR APPOINTMENTS PLEASE Call us: 212-260-6084 welcome to ayurveda's world who we are? ayurveda's world We are one of the oldest Ayurveda centers in New York City, managed by Vaidya (Dr.) Naina Marballi since 1998. We are also one of very few centers in the United States to be certified by the American Association of Drugless Practitioners (AADP) to provide Ayurveda Study Programs. Our center specializes in Ayurvedic workshops, study programs, consultations, and skin care services. Conveniently located in Lower Manhattan near the Fulton Street Station, we offer a relaxing atmosphere to visitors from all parts of the world. LET US KNOW HOW WE CAN HELP YOU! "Your body's cellular wisdom already knows Ayurveda. Allow your mind to discover, learn and share its natural, loving, practical and healing power which has been practiced and refined over thousands of years."
